General.Name: Sungei Bagan Rubber Malaya
General.Description: Sungei Bagan Rubber Company (Malaya) Berhad produces and sells fresh oil palm fruit bunches in Malaysia. It operates through two segments, Plantation and Investments. The company's Plantation segment cultivates oil palm. As of June 30, 2022, it owned 4,728 acres of planted area. Its Investments segment is involved in long term portfolio investment in securities, and deposits with banks in Singapore, Hong Kong, the United Kingdom, Mauritius, the Cayman Islands, and Australia. Sungei Bagan Rubber Company (Malaya) Berhad was incorporated in 1958 and is based in Machang, Malaysia.
